# random forest
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
patern <- read_csv("patternator_data.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```

```{r}
patern %>% 
  mutate(cv_type = case_when(
    cv <= 10           ~ "good",
    cv > 10 & cv <= 15 ~ "okay",
    TRUE               ~ "bad"
  )) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = solution_name, y = cv)) +
  geom_jitter(aes(color = cv_type)) +
  facet_grid(pressure ~ nozzle) +
  coord_flip()
```
